segments.text: I cannot believe how careless the woman is!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is pouring out of the sink like it’s being ignored.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: How can she not feel the cold water lapping at her feet?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It’s infuriating to see that she’s too engrossed in drying dishes to realize the chaos around her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Those children are taking such a risk with that unstable stool!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy looks too determined to reach those cookies, but at what cost?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I want to shake her and tell her to look around.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just standing there, hands outstretched, waiting for her turn.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Everything feels out of balance, and I can’t help but feel frustrated.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Their innocence is somehow both charming and infuriating at the same time.
segments.speaker: PAR
